Matt,
I don't know much about Chinese guards, but that looks like a mirror that has been cut out.  I have a Japanese guard made of two small mirrors done in sanmai over a copper core.  Third one down at:

http://home.earthlink.net/~jggilbert/irogane.htm

Thomas Chen has a site under construction on Chinese swords.  There are some fittings illustrated there.  He's still working on it, but I hope that he'll develop it into an authoritative resource on continental swords.

http://thomaschen.freewebspace.com
http://chineseswords.freewebspace.com

Jim



  http://www.trocadero.com/asianantiques/items/108548/item108548.html

  Matt
